name: Dlyte.com
overview:
Dlyte.com is a customer reward platform that leverages the power and ubiquity of gift cards to acquire and retain customers for local and national brands. Customers buy gift cards and are awarded a free loyalty currency that they then use to win or buy more gift cards at up to 95% off the face value of the card. Users are afforded a smart and fun way to stretch their dollars, and our brand partners get a rich source of new customers without having to devalue or discount their brand to do so.

After a successful product launch and market test under the brand YouNeverLose.com, the business has rebranded and added new games for consumers to spend their points. Dlyte.com is set to launch to the consumer in Dec. 2012
